translations.translation: That you should send the children of Israel with us.'
that you let the Children of Israel go with us.'"
‘That you let the Descendants of Israel go with us.’”
`So allow the Children of Israel to go with us."'
Then send with us the children of Israel.
so send forth with us the Children of Israel."
(Saying): Let the Children of Israel go with us.
let the Children of Israel go with us!'"
Send with us the Children of Isra'il?
that you let the Children of Israel leave with us.’’ ’
Send thou with us the Children of Israel.'"
So allow the Children of Israel to go with us.' "
Send forth with us the Children of Israel'
Let the Children of Israel go with us.'“
[Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel."'"
[26:17] that you should let go forth with us, to Syria, the Children of Israel” ’. So they approached him and said to him that which has been mentioned.
((Saying): Let the Children of Israel go with Us) and do not torture them.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { أَنْ أَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا } قومنا { بَنِيۤ إِسْرَائِيلَ } [الشعراء: 17] أي: خلِّ سبيلهم؛ حتى يذهبوا بنا إلى أرض الشام سالمين عن ظلمك وجورك
